name: Root Slap
description:
Description:

You are a small seed trying to grow in this harsh and brutal world. To keep yourself safe you must the unthinkable: SLAP YOUR ENEMIES UNTIL THEY STOP MOVING! and get some water.

Disclaimer: No real bugs were harmed during the making of this videogame.

Team:

Diogo Pires - Art

Alexandre Duarte - Programming

João Santos - Programming

Rómulo Kaidussis - Programming

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2023 - Técnico/Belas Artes.
